title: Great Rice Cooker, Not So Great Slow Cooker
body: I bought this mainly to cook rice and to use the slow cooker. 5/5 Rice Cooker, much better than a similar product I was using. 2/5 Slow Cooker. Cooks way too hot and can't be left to cook for the day: recipes that should take many hours are done in 2.
Es excelente, súper práctica y de muy buenos materiales, recomendable 100%

title: Perfect rice!
body:
Small but holds a lot of rice and cooks it to perfection.
Takes a little longer than my old rice cooker… About 40 minutes - but super easy to use and clean.

title: Good quality
body: Fantastic I Love You
Muy buena
Cumplió mis expectativas, súper bien queda el arroz
Me gustó mucho lo recomiendo excelente artículo para la cocina

title: Great rice cooker
body: I love this product. Makes the rice perfectly

title: I would buy it again
body: I am extremely impressed with this Aroma rice cooker! It’s incredibly easy to use, with clearly labeled buttons for white rice, brown rice, steaming, and slow cooking. The results are always consistent—fluffy rice, perfectly steamed vegetables, and even delicious slow-cooked meals.

title: nice rice cooker for this price point
body: I really like my rice cooker. I use it frequently. I make rice well. I use the knuckle method and it works every time. is not messy at all and is easy to clean.
